trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control attempts to switch between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>é gerado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>tentativas de controle alternar entre o modo somente leitura, inserir e editar, mas antes que o modo for alterado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as configuring the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control for a specific mode or canceling the mode change, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você forneça um método de manipulação de eventos que executa uma rotina personalizada, como configurar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>de controle para um modo específico ou cancelar a alteração do modo, sempre que esse evento ocorre.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the mode to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is changing, to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit or insert operation, or to indicate that the mode change should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventArgs>objeto é passado para o método de manipulação de eventos, que permite que você determine o modo no qual o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle está mudando para determinar se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>evento foi gerado como resultado do usuário cancelar uma operação de edição ou de inserção ou para indicar que a alteração do modo deve ser cancelada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To determine the new mode, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o novo modo, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A> property to programmatically specify an alternate mode to which to change by setting it to one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>propriedade para especificar programaticamente um modo alternativo para o qual alterar definindo-a como uma da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode>valores de enumeração.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A> property to determine whether this event was raised as the result of the user canceling an edit or insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>propriedade para determinar se esse evento foi gerado como resultado do usuário cancelar a edição ou a operação de inserção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the mode change, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para cancelar a alteração do modo, defina o <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the FormViewModeEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância da classe FormViewModeEventArgs, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial de uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>|The value of the `cancelingEdit` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>|The value of the `mode` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>| O valor de `cancelingEdit` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>| O valor de `mode` parâmetro. | > [!NOTE] > Este construtor é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle quando gerar eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode"> </xref> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging"></xref> event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging"> </xref> evento foi gerado como resultado do usuário cancelar uma operação de edição; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging"></xref> event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging"> </xref> evento foi gerado como resultado do usuário cancelar uma operação de edição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control attempts to switch between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>é gerado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>tentativas de controle alternar entre o modo somente leitura, inserir e editar, mas antes que o modo for alterado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>

trans-unit.source: Use the CancelingEdit property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit or insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade CancelingEdit para determinar se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>evento foi gerado como resultado do usuário cancelar uma operação de edição ou de inserção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to reset the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control whenever the user cancels an edit operation.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode querer redefinir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle sempre que o usuário cancela uma operação de edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging"></xref> event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging"> </xref> evento foi gerado como resultado do usuário cancelar uma operação de edição; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is changing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo no qual o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> controle está sendo alterado.

trans-unit.source: Use the NewMode property to determine the mode to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is changing.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade NewMode para determinar o modo no qual o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle está sendo alterado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to configure the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control based on the mode to which it changes.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, talvez você queira configurar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle com base no modo no qual ele se altera.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to specify the mode to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control changes by setting it to one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar essa propriedade para especificar o modo no qual o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controlar alterações definindo-a como uma da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode>valores de enumeração.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode"> </xref> valores de enumeração.
